availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Russell (Louisville, Kentucky, deputy marshal for Louisville east district)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, deputy marshal. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet Pilcher Russell. Father of Kate Russell, Eliza Russell, Columbus Russell, Lucretia Russell, and Alice Russell. Deputy city marshal in Louisville in 1860. Deputy marshal for the east district of the City Court in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 2, p. 264.
Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861, ed. Henry Tanner, (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 324.
“Society,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), March 24, 1889, p. 6.
KYR-0001-004-0134.
